note.p: Solicitor with premises at 45 Margaret Street, Cavendish Square, London. Brother of Alfred Russel Wallace’s fiancée, Marian Leslie. Admitted pensioner at Queen’s College, Cambridge, 1 March 1864; BA, 1868.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/18/2/8)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1917 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 8 July 2019)
